name: Small Leaf Jade Plant
description: The Small Leaf Jade Plant is a compact and attractive succulent with tiny, thick green leaves growing densely on woody stems. This plant is very easy to grow and suitable for beginners, as it needs bright light and watering only when the soil is completely dry. Low maintenance and long-lasting, the Small Leaf Jade Plant is ideal for homes, offices, and gifting.
